name: Hilda is the good Child
description:
"Hilda is the good child" is a game about a girl that is locked into her room in the cellar by her abusive mother. In order to escape her prison she needs to find her spare key. After being treated like that by her mother,  her imagination is creating her own world in her room.

In this game you solve a number of puzzles in order to escape the room. The central game mechanic is a rotating beam of shadow that is resetting your progress you have made so far - if you or the things you collect get caught by it.

The game was made in 48h as part of the #ludumdare47 game jam.

Controls: WASD and SPACE

Design, art and programming: Tobias Schnackenberg, Johannes Keiser

Made with love in Bremen, Germany.
